questions.question: List all stakeholder teams involved in the launch (comma-separated)
questions.description: Teams that need to be aligned on the launch details
questions.placeholder: Product, Marketing, Sales, Customer Success, Support

questions.question: What is the target launch date?
questions.description: The planned date when the product/feature will be available to customers

questions.question: What is the name of the product or feature being launched?
questions.description: This identifies the specific product or feature for the go-to-market plan
questions.placeholder: Acme Cloud Platform â€“ Advanced Reporting

questions.question: Who is the Document Owner responsible for maintaining this document?
questions.description: The team or person accountable for updates and accuracy

questions.question: What features or capabilities are included in this launch?
questions.description: Defines the scope of what customers will receive on launch day
questions.placeholder: New advanced reporting dashboard, Scheduled report exports, Role-based report access

questions.question: What is explicitly NOT included in this launch?
questions.description: Sets expectations and avoids scope creep
questions.placeholder: Custom report builder, API access for reports (future release)

questions.question: What personas should be included in the target audience table?
questions.description: Each persona row defines who will benefit and why

questions.question: Which competitors should be analyzed and how do we compare?
questions.description: Helps sales and marketing position against alternatives

questions.question: How is the feature/product packaged across pricing tiers?
questions.description: Clarifies which customers get access under which plans

questions.question: What marketing activities and channels will be used for the launch?
questions.description: Defines who does what and where to promote the launch

questions.question: How will internal teams be informed and trained before launch?
questions.description: Ensures all internal stakeholders are ready on launch day

questions.question: What metrics and targets will measure launch success?
questions.description: Quantifiable goals to evaluate post-launch performance

questions.question: What are the key risks and how will they be mitigated?
questions.description: Proactive planning to reduce launch issues
